title: Wow, you need help? Really?
description: I guess these are the commands you can use to talk to me...

fields.name: $diss signup
fields.value: This is step 1, if you haven't done this yet... you're kidding yourself.

fields.name: $diss register 'lol' / 'tft' <summonername>
fields.value: You should probably let me know what game you play and your user name.

fields.name: OR: $diss register 'val' <valorant username> [tagline]
fields.value: Yo, you play Valorant? You probably bottom frag huh?

fields.name: $diss vs 'lol' / 'tft' @discord nickname
fields.value: I'll compared you to up to 3 friends, but it's not like you have that many anyway.

fields.name: $diss roast 'lol' / 'tft'  @discord nickname
fields.value: I'll try my best to give a nice opinion of this person's last match.

fields.name: $diss help
fields.value: If I really need to explain what this does, you need more help than I can give...

fields.name: Things to note...
fields.value: Keep in mind when referring to games, I only respond to 'tft' ( TeamFightTactics ) and 'lol' ( LeagueOfLegends ), just keep it short and sweet alright?
